summary:
I am a Certified International Property Specialist and Real Estate Manager dealing with international real estate investors and residential buyers. Our team of experts handles residential transactions, real estate investments and property management.

My personal interest is in applying technological applications for the real estate sector, #PropTech, such as data management, cloud computing, machine learning and blockchain applications.

* Real estate professional and manager (VGM NL, VGME, Amsterdam Real Estate Brokers' Association, MVA, chapter of NVM)
* FIREC - FIABCI International Real Estate Consultant Designation by FIABCI The International Real Estate Federation
* International Realtor® (National Association of REALTORS®)
* CIPS® designation (Certified International Property Specialist) by NAR (National Association of REALTORS®)
* TRC designation (Transnational Referral Certification) designation

Current clients include real estate investors, home buyers, property managers and real estate service providers.

Memberships, associations, designations and international councils: see section "Organizations"

Keywords: International real estate asset management and brokerage, real estate management, residential investment properties, property management, sale and leasing, brokerage, transactions, international marketing, property investments, new homes, condominiums, second homes, international living, real estate agent, residential, commercial, housing agents, expat rentals, landlord or tenant rep, buying agent.

treasury_media.title: Property management   trends in the netherlands and in the usa
treasury_media.description:
Current role and trends, from traditional management of the physical property and administration to dynamic property management:

Relationship with other real estate professionals, contractors/vendors.
Outsourcing, SLA, Purchase conditions (versus General sales conditions of sale) 
Outsourcing and directing the operations/execution
Type and size of property portfolio’s, specialization and focus
Asset- en Lease Management, rental listings, tenants’ incentives, energy savings, service charges
Ancillary Services Management
Revenue management
Repositioning, transformation and redevelopment
Investment sales
Rental listings

treasury_media.title: Noordam Management - International Realtor - Real Estate Manager
treasury_media.description: Interested in real estate investing or in need of property management services? We can assist you in our areas in Amsterdam (Netherlands) and Florida (USA), where our team of experts handle your real estate investments and property management. Call us at 020-7165673 in the Netherlands or (305) 709 0548 in the USA.

company.name: Noordam Management - International Real Estate Services

profile_positions.description:
Real Estate Services for investment property and residential real estate with an international team of partners and specialists.

Certifications & designations:
* MVA Real Estate Broker practice test by MVA, the largest regional section of the NVM (Netherlands Association of Real Estate Brokers)
* FIREC - FIABCI International Real Estate Consultant Designation by FIABCI The International Real Estate Federation
* Certified International Property Specialist (CIPS®) by National Association of REALTORS®, USA
* Transnational Referral Certification (TRC) designation

Activities:
Real Estate Consultancy, Agency/Transactions, Real Estate Management & Property Management
Counselling (international) residential real estate investors and international luxury home buyers
Representation of real estate investors and corporations in the Netherlands
Representation of real estate project developers and master brokers in the Netherlands

Services: 
Real Estate Business Consultancy
Real Estate Management & Property Management
Real Estate Advisory & Agency

Property types:
Income / Investment Properties
Residential and Leisure real estate
Rehab properties
Tenanted properties
Mixed real estate
International Real Estate

profile_positions.description: Real estate consultant and manager. Real estate management for property investment portfolio’s, operations and leasing of residential and commercial real estate, for Dutch and international real estate investors. Management for small and midsize investors with a total value of real estate portfolio's under management in excess of € 400 million.
profile_positions.title: Real Estate Management & ICT - NVM, MVA, VGM NL, VGME

profile_positions.company: Amsterdamse Maatschappij tot Beheer van Onroerende Goederen - Vastgoedmanagement & Amsterdam Living
profile_positions.description: After 5 years, I decided to step down as director. Dealt with coordinating the operational activities, advising and controlling the various departments and employees within the organization, human resources, coordinating change and improvement projects, maintaining contacts with clients and suppliers, maintaining contacts with real estate companies, representation in branch and professional organizations. In short, coordinating, leading, policy-defining, advising, supervising and represention tasks.
profile_positions.title: Director Of Property Management

profile_positions.description: Relationship management with customers and stakeholders, internal operational management and control, administrative and information output, reporting, development of processs/procedures/workflows for administrative, commercial, technical and financial management.

company.name: Leading Real Estate Companies of the World

profile_positions.company: Leading Real Estate Companies of the World
profile_positions.description: International Property Specialist at VOC International Real Estate Services (Netherlands) of Leading Real Estate Companies of the World®. Leading Real Estate Companies of the World® (www.LeadingRE.com) is a selective global community of the highest quality independent real estate companies, with 565 companies and 130,000 sales associates in over 70 countries. Last year, the network generated over one million transactions valued at $372 billion in annual home sales, with 1.1 million transactions.
profile_positions.title: International Realtor® & Global Property Specialist, CIPS®, TRC, FIREC

profile_positions.company: Leading Real Estate Companies of the World
profile_positions.description:
Realtor® & Global Property Specialist at Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices EWM Realty, one of the principal owners of the Leading Real Estate Companies of the World (Leading RE), comprising more than 565 real estate firms and 130,000 associates marketing residential properties in 70 countries.

Founded in 1964, Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices EWM Realty (EWM) is one of the largest real estate services firms in America. EWM’s 800 associates and staff members offer residential and commercial real estate services, corporate relocation, and international services, as well as home mortgage and title closing.

EWM is a wholly owned subsidiary of HomeServices of America, Inc., a Berkshire Hathaway affiliate. HomeServices is the second-largest full-service independent residential real estate brokerage firm, and the largest real estate settlement services provider, in the U.S.

EWM is the exclusive Miami-Dade and Broward Counties affiliate for Christie’s International Real Estate (CIRE), the leading and largest network of luxury, independent, real estate firms in the world, and a subsidiary of Christie's International PLC, the London-based art auction company founded in 1766.
profile_positions.title: Realtor® & Global Property Specialist, CIPS®

company.name: FIABCI, The International Real Estate Federation

profile_positions.company: FIABCI, The International Real Estate Federation
profile_positions.description: Founded in 1951 in Paris, FIABCI is a worldwide business networking organization for all professionals associated with the real estate industry.
profile_positions.title: Advisor To The Board

profile_positions.company: FIABCI, The International Real Estate Federation
profile_positions.title: Member

profile_positions.company: FIABCI, The International Real Estate Federation
profile_positions.description: My areas of expertise within FIABCI are Real Estate Management & Brokerage. FIABCI is a business network of real estate professionals in 60 countries and a federation of 100 national real estate associations. Also FIABCI is a special consultant with NGO status to the Economic and Social Council of the United Nations Organisation (ECOSOC). FIABCI represents all real estate disciplines: brokerage, property management, valuation / appraisal, property development and consulting, lawyers, insurers, architects, urban planners.
profile_positions.title: President FIABCI Netherlands

company.name: Leerdam Properties

profile_positions.description: Realtor® and licensed in the state of Florida, USA. Leerdam Properties Inc is a real estate investment and residential brokerage company, based in Orlando, Florida. Leerdam Properties offers Selling Solutions, Buyer Representation, and Investment Management Services. Their track record includes having served as a top producer for some of the largest institutional real estate companies in the world. They trust them to do a good job and they would love the opportunity to earn your business by offering the same uncompromised services to help you meet your goals.
